title: MD
biography: Ajay Kumar Singh is a leading specialist in CKD research at Nephrology.
aiSummary: Ajay Kumar Singh is a ckd research specialist with an H-index of 110 at Nephrology (Faculty). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, Procedia Environmental Sciences, Journal of Cellular Biochemistry. Based in India.
